languages.text: "Ксеносы подослали к славному Друзу своих убийц, но воля Императора защитила Его слугу. Сраженный насмерть, но чудесно воскресший Друз утвердился во главе Анжуйского похода как Лорд-милитант и завершил истребление ксеносов. Он привел к согласию сектор Каликсис и был объявлен Прижизненным Святым".

traits.locale_text: "Ксеносы подослали к славному Друзу своих убийц, но воля Его защитила Его слугу. Сраженный насмерть, но чудесно воскресший Друз утвердился во главе Анжуйского похода как Лорд-милитант и завершил истребление ксеносов. Он привел к согласию сектор Каликсида и был объявлен Прижизненным Святым".

languages.text: "The xenos sent their assassins to the great Drusus, but the Emperor's will shielded His servant from the attack. Slain but resurrected through a miracle, Drusus asserted himself at the head of the Angevin Crusade as its Lord Militant and saw the xenos extermination through to the end. He brought the Calixis Sector to accord and was proclaimed a Living Saint."
languages.original_text: "Ксеносы подослали к славному Друзу своих убийц, но воля Императора защитила Его слугу. Сраженный насмерть, но чудесно воскресший Друз утвердился во главе Анжуйского похода как Лорд-милитант и завершил истребление ксеносов. Он привел к согласию сектор Каликсис и был объявлен Прижизненным Святым".

He brought the Calixis Sector to accord and was proclaimed a Living Saint."

languages.text: “异形派遣刺客暗杀伟大的德鲁苏斯，但帝皇的意志保护祂的仆人免受伤害。尽管德鲁苏斯遭到杀害，但又在奇迹的力量之下复活。他担任起安杰文远征的大元帅一职，亲自将异形之敌彻底消灭。他为卡利西斯星区带来了秩序，后来被加封为活圣人。”
languages.original_text: "The xenos sent their assassins to the great Drusus, but the Emperor's will shielded His servant from the attack. Slain but resurrected through a miracle, Drusus asserted himself at the head of the Angevin Crusade as its Lord Militant and saw the xenos extermination through to the end. He brought the Calixis Sector to accord and was proclaimed a Living Saint."

traits.locale_text: “异形派遣刺客暗杀伟大的德鲁苏斯，但帝皇的意志保护祂的仆人免受伤害。尽管德鲁苏斯遭到杀害，但又在奇迹的力量之下复活。他担任起安杰文远征的大元帅一职，亲自将异形之敌彻底消灭。他为卡利西斯星区带来了秩序，后来被加封为活圣人。”

languages.text: «Los xenos enviaron a sus asesinos en contra del gran Drusus, pero la voluntad del Emperador protegió a Su sirviente del ataque. Asesinado y posteriormente resucitado mediante un milagro, Drusus comandó la Cruzada de Angevin bajo el título de Lord Comandante y aseguró el exterminio de los xenos. Se encargó de pacificar el sector Calixis y fue proclamado Santo en Vida».
languages.original_text: "The xenos sent their assassins to the great Drusus, but the Emperor's will shielded His servant from the attack. Slain but resurrected through a miracle, Drusus asserted himself at the head of the Angevin Crusade as its Lord Militant and saw the xenos extermination through to the end. He brought the Calixis Sector to accord and was proclaimed a Living Saint."

traits.locale_text: «Los xenos enviaron a sus asesinos en contra del gran Drusus, pero la voluntad del Emperador protegió a Su sirviente del ataque. Asesinado y posteriormente resucitado mediante un milagro, Drusus comandó la Cruzada de Angevin bajo el título de Lord Comandante y aseguró el exterminio de los xenos. Se encargó de pacificar el sector Calixis y fue proclamado Santo en Vida».

languages.text: 「異種族は偉大なるドルススのもとに刺客を送り込みましたが、皇帝の意志がその従者の身をお守りくださったのです。一度は殺されましたが奇跡によって復活したドルススは、アンジェヴィン十字軍の総司令官として異種族退治を最後までやり遂げました。彼はカリクシス星域に協定をもたらし、生ける聖人と宣言されたのです」
languages.original_text: "The xenos sent their assassins to the great Drusus, but the Emperor's will shielded His servant from the attack. Slain but resurrected through a miracle, Drusus asserted himself at the head of the Angevin Crusade as its Lord Militant and saw the xenos extermination through to the end. He brought the Calixis Sector to accord and was proclaimed a Living Saint."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族は偉大なるドルススのもとに刺客を送り込みましたが、皇帝の意志がその従者の身をお守りくださったのです。一度は殺されましたが奇跡によって復活したドルススは、アンジェヴィン十字軍の総司令官として異種族退治を最後までやり遂げました。彼はカリクシス星域に協定をもたらし、生ける聖人と宣言されたのです」

languages.text: "Die Xenos schickten ihre Assassinen zum großen Drusus, doch der Wille des Imperators schützte seinen Diener vor dem Angriff. Erschlagen, aber durch ein Wunder wiederbelebt, erklärte sich Drusus zum Lord Militant und damit Anführer des Angevinischen Kreuzzugs und schlug die Xenos am Ende vernichtend. Er brachte den Calixis-Sektor unter Kontrolle und wurde zum Lebenden Heiligen erklärt."
languages.original_text: "The xenos sent their assassins to the great Drusus, but the Emperor's will shielded His servant from the attack. Slain but resurrected through a miracle, Drusus asserted himself at the head of the Angevin Crusade as its Lord Militant and saw the xenos extermination through to the end. He brought the Calixis Sector to accord and was proclaimed a Living Saint."

traits.locale_text: "Die Xenos schickten ihre Assassinen zum großen Drusus, doch der Wille des Imperators schützte seinen Diener vor dem Angriff. Erschlagen, aber durch ein Wunder wiederbelebt, erklärte sich Drusus zum Lord Militant und damit Anführer des Angevinischen Kreuzzugs und schlug die Xenos am Ende vernichtend. Er brachte den Calixis-Sektor unter Kontrolle und wurde zum Lebenden Heiligen erklärt."

languages.text: « Les xénos envoyèrent leurs assassins pourfendre le grand Drusus, mais la volonté de l'Empereur protégea Son serviteur de l'attaque. Abattu, mais ramené d'entre les morts par un miracle, Drusus prit sa juste place à la tête de la Croisade d'Angevin, dont il devint le Seigneur-commandeur Militant, et mena à bien l'extermination des xénos. Il conquit le secteur Calixis et fut proclamé Saint Vivant. »
languages.original_text: "The xenos sent their assassins to the great Drusus, but the Emperor's will shielded His servant from the attack. Slain but resurrected through a miracle, Drusus asserted himself at the head of the Angevin Crusade as its Lord Militant and saw the xenos extermination through to the end. He brought the Calixis Sector to accord and was proclaimed a Living Saint."

traits.locale_text: « Les xénos envoyèrent leurs assassins pourfendre le grand Drusus, mais la volonté de l'Empereur protégea Son serviteur de l'attaque. Abattu, mais ramené d'entre les morts par un miracle, Drusus prit sa juste place à la tête de la Croisade d'Angevin, dont il devint le Seigneur-commandeur Militant, et mena à bien l'extermination des xénos. Il conquit le secteur Calixis et fut proclamé Saint Vivant. »

languages.text: "Zenolar, ulu Drusus'un peşine suikastçılarını göndermişti. Gelgelelim İmparator'un iradesi, hizmetkârını saldırıdan korudu. Öldürülse de bir mucize sayesinde dirilen Drusus, Lord Militan olarak Angevin Seferi'nin başına geçti ve zeno temizliği sona erene kadar durmadı. Calixis Sektörü'ne birlik getirdi ve Yaşayan Aziz ilan edildi."
languages.original_text: "The xenos sent their assassins to the great Drusus, but the Emperor's will shielded His servant from the attack. Slain but resurrected through a miracle, Drusus asserted himself at the head of the Angevin Crusade as its Lord Militant and saw the xenos extermination through to the end. He brought the Calixis Sector to accord and was proclaimed a Living Saint."

traits.locale_text: "Zenolar ulu Drusus'a suikastçılarını gönderdiler ama İmparator'un iradesi, hizmetkârını saldırıdan korudu. Öldürülen ancak bir mucize vasıtasıyla hayata dönen Drusus, Lord Militan olarak Angevin Seferi'nin başına geçti ve zeno temizliği sona erene kadar da hiç durmadı. Calixis Sektörü'nde uzlaşma sağladı ve Yaşayan Aziz ilan edildi."
